comments: She is a great professor. Always willing to help and she emails back quickly. I have never been very interested in history but her class kept me focused. Best that the college has to offer.
I absolutely love her! This is my second semester taking her & she is amazing! Greatest teacher at WCCCD!!
Amazing teacher! Didn\'t use the books, everything was based of power points. Tests are simple and to the point. Easy A!

This is the best history professor there is! PLEASE take her! She makes history so interesting and teaches it in a way you\'ll retain it. The tests are easy if you pay attention and study. She also gives you the option to not take the last test if you pass the first 2. There is also one paper that you can decide what to write about. One word, great.

This professor is the BEST, she knows her history. Her lectures are interesting and tests are easy. Attendance is not mandatory but you will miss information. There is a research paper and presentation. Otherwise an easy A plus you gain some knowledge regarding history. Good Luck!

SHE IS THE BEST INSTRUCTOR BY FAR SHE IS UP FRONT AND STRAIGHT FORWARD ABOUT HER TESTS AND TERM PAPER SHE DOES NOT HIDE ANYTHING FROM YOU. HER SLIDES ARE GREAT AND SHE KNOWS HER STUFF IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A HISTORY TEACHER SHE IS THE ONE TO TAKE

Mrs.Kantlzer is a GREST! proff. she knows her stuff, shes fast but will keep you interested with her random stories. She not open for class discussion, but will stay on point. I would most DEF. recomend her to anyone who doesnt like history.
She was very knowledgeable and gave out through notes. Always gave out good study guides before exams. And she\'s not so bad on the eyes either!
Professor was extremely knowledgeable on the subject and sensitive to the needs of the class. Would recommend her to anyone with an interest in history.
Teacher is not organized and changes schedules/plans as class goes along. Would not recommend her to someone who takes the subject seriously as she hands out grades.

This teacher brings further detail into the historical periods she taught to the class as well as further depth. As long as you take notes , pay attention more to what she says at the lecture,and have a minimal interest in history at least, you\'ll do wonders. As much as colleges try to scam you to get books, go to the library and borrow a copy.

Wonderful instructor,she\'s very fair and only wants the best for her students.She makes the class very easy for you.She knows her history. She\'ll always e-mail you back and very helpful.Thank you Ms. Kantzler
Greatest Professor at the college
The only history teacher at WCCCD worth taking. She is also very hot.

Excellent instructor. She covers a lot of material in a short period of time, but as long as you take good notes and use he study guide you\'ll be fine. As a teacher she welcomes questions and some discussion, and never talks down to the class. If you\'re taking an intro-level history class, she\'s highly recommended.
Great teacher!!!!!
Can I saw COOL TEACHER, she makes history stick, and has some of the hottest legs I ever seen! Easy A
OMG This is one of the easiest and coolest instructors ever, she\'s really good (No Text book needed) she uses her own notes you copy & study, test and there you go easy A..
One of the best teachers I\'ve come across EVER! She\'s super nice and very understanding. She knows her history and she keeps it interesting and fun. I highly recommend her!!
I love her! Great teacher! Tests are fair, u will have to do a research paper.She brings in DVDs to watch that go along with what we are studying. A+!
